channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟡 10:50 PM The threat of artobrats in Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Dnipropetrovsk region
item.description: 🟡 10:50 PM The threat of artobrats in Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Dnipropetrovsk region#M_MAMARTA_AMA_AMA_AMACA_AMACA This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
